document_data.name: Trade of the Tools
document_data.mainbody: '''Trade of the Tools''' was a shop in [[Daggerford]] that specialized in selling all manner of [[tool]]s and household items in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was owned by the individualistic man known as [[Old Ander]].
document_data.Location: The shop was located in Daggerford's [[Money Quarter]].
document_data.Interior: Trade of the Tools was nothing short of an absolute mess.
document_data.Services: The massive building was full of all manner of items, from broken and near-useless furniture, to functional and practical hand tools. Old Ander bought all manner of items, reconditioned and repaired them if necessary, and rented or sold them to his customers.
